strapiPost.title: Razorback Baseball Team Advances To The Super Regionals
strapiPost.content:
The Diamond Hogs are in the NCAA postseason Super Regional round after a 7-3 win over Oklahoma State on Monday.

  • Baseball: This weekend, the Super Regional games will be in Chapel Hill, North Carolina, with the Hogs playing the University of North Carolina Tar Heels in a best-of-three. The first two games will be Saturday at 10a and Sunday at 12p, and the winner will advance to the College World Series in Omaha. 
  • Weekend Recap: If you didn't have a chance to watch all 12+ hours of Arkansas baseball last weekend, here is a quick recap: The Stillwater Regional set NCAA records for most runs (148) and most home runs (41) at a postseason site. Arkansas contributed to 48 of those runs and a number of HRs including a grand slam.

Read more about last weekend and upcoming games HERE.
